column1: '''Middle-earth Network''' was a [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]-based online community and network. It included a social networking website
column3: and a news website.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://network.mymiddleearth.com/2011/08/09/here-there-be-dragons/|articlename=Here there be Dragons|dated=9-Aug-2011|website=[http://network.mymiddleearth.com Middle-earth Network]|accessed=20-June-2012}}</ref>
